body_html: I would appreciate it if you would reconsider for the same reasons it was reconsidered in #15777. We are happily using the java API on CentOS 7. This version upgrade to TF effectively means we need to rebuild these artifacts and deploy the associated (non-trivial) build chain.
body_text: I would appreciate it if you would reconsider for the same reasons it was reconsidered in #15777.  We are happily using the java API on CentOS 7.  This version upgrade to TF effectively means we need to rebuild these artifacts and deploy the associated (non-trivial) build chain.
